property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Choose a number for X that is greater than 0. Remove X tactics in your discard pile from the game.
EFFECT: You may search your deck for a tactic with numeric cost X or less and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.
FLIP UP: 1 [O] and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by waiya Also known as ruminant hash, or salmagundi stew.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: thunderhoof, seraphim, dragon

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Thunderhoof
When this card enters play, put X tokens on it, where X is the number of [O] you control.
This card gains 1 strength for each token on it.
DISRUPT COST: Pay 2. Remove a token from this card. Pick an opponent. EFFECT: That player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D game mechanic by waiya

property.name: Subtype
property.value: geiseric, demon knight

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Geiseric
If a character is put into your opponent's hand from play,you may pay 1 instead. If you do, remove it from the game and put a token on this card.
SOUL CONSUMPTION COST: Pay 2. Remove a token from this card. EFFECT: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put 1 into your hand and 1 on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: he's on a diet

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All non-resource cards gain the rules text "Unique X", where X is the card's name.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by waiya ·"Can you carve your name into a stone twenty feet high? No? Then I guess you're not God.·

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When a character with 3 strength of less enters play under and opponent's control, destoy that character and inflict X damage to this card, where X is that character's strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: whoa… great graphics! I love rainbows and fountains… of blood.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Each player choose a card of each non-resource type they control. Put all remaining non-resource cards into their owner's hand.
RECUR: [O][O][O][O] COST: Use this only if this card is in your discard pile. Pay 4. Remove this card from the game. EFFECT: Each opponent reveals their hand, chooses a card of each non-resource type in it, and discards the remaining non-resource cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: life itself is the proper binge

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If a character is put into a player's hand, destroy it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: as a final humiliation, you must walk home naked

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Play this only in response to a character being played. If you did not play this card using FLIP UP, pay X, where X is the character's numeric cost.
EFFECT: Terminate the character.
FLIP UP: 1 [G] and your faction loses 5 influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: [LangA]AFLAC! ·"It's the quacking of that hideous heart!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Choose a number for X that is less than or equal to the number of [G] you control.
EFFECT: Draw X cards. Your faction loses X+X influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by waiya When you gotta go, you gotta go.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick 2 characters.
When this card enter play, deplete those characters.
PARTY ON! COST: Inflict 1 damage to this location. If you do, pick a character. EFFECT: Deplete the character.
Characters depleted by this card cannot be restored by their controller's factions's restore rule.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: you're invited to our fundraiser… we insist…

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, name a card subtype.
Players must pay 2 to play cards with the named subtype.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Lekkit ·"We don't take kindly to strangers 'round here!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a character with the UNIQUE keyword in its rules text.
EFFECT: Remove the character from the game.
RECUR: [G][G] COST: Use this only while this card is in your discard pile. Pay 1. Remove this card from the game. EFFECT: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: you never waste time. time wastes you.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: vilghame, sword of great justice

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Vilghame
Your opponent must pay 1 to play a tactic.
The first resource each opponent plays each turn enters play attached to that opponent's faction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He knows you ate his pudding. How can you have any pudding if you don't eat your meat?!

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: If you played this card using FLIP UP X is 4, otherwise X is 2. Pick X or fewer characters.
EFFECT: This turn, the characters must attack if they can. Draw a card.
FLIP UP: 2 [E]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Paul That's not what we meant by "Flip Up"…

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, draw a card.
Reduce the numeric cost of characters you play by 2, to a minimum of 1.
All your characters lose 1 strength and 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i'm not usually the butt of a joke …I'm usually the face.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
All unresolved cards are terminated.
If an opponent played at least 2 cards with the same name this turn, put up to 2 Micromajig tokens into play under your control. Otherwise, each opponent may put 3 Micromajig tokens into play under their control.
FLIP UP: 2 [E][E] and you may play a resource.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: uh uh uh! You didn't say the magic word

property.name: Subtype
property.value: merbegon, demon knight

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Merbegon
This card can attack even if it has not been in play under your control since the start of the turn.
If a character enters play under your control, you may destroy that character. If you do, X is that character's strength and Y is that character's life. You may pick a character. If you do, it gains X strength and Y life this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
COST: Pick a card you control with an ability in its rules text.
EFFECT: You may use one of the card's abilities. If you do, the effect happens twice instead of once. Destroy the card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by GooDMaN88 Sometimes the mother of invention is madness.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: grandchest, seraphim, dragon

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Grandchest
The top card of your deck is revealed at all times.
While the top card of your deck is revealed, this card gains X strength, where X is the numeric cost of that card.
SHAKE UP COST: Pay 2. EFFECT: Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D game mechanic by waiya

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Community Chest
At the start of each player's turn, both players may draw a card or play a resource.
If you control at least [D] and choose to put this card on the bottom of your deck as part of your mulligan at the start of a game, you may reveal it. If you do, draw a card at the start of your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D game mechanic by waiya

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
Deplete all non-Rogue characters. Draw a card.
FLIP UP: 1 [D] and your faction loses 5 influence.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by MrJennings ·"I don’t understand it. James Coco went mad in fifteen minutes!·

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Fornicaves
All characters lose X life, where X is their printed life minus 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by kallisti This was an actual thing. Look it up.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: iohane, sword of great justice

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Iohane
You may play this card whenever you could play a tactic.
At the start of your turn, flip a coin. If you win, draw a card.
SNEAK COST: Pay 1. EFFECT: This card gains Covert this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: hukk! blurp! slosh! …and pose!

property.name: Subtype
property.value: ipsighast, demon knight

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Ipsighast
EXHUMATION COST: Pay 3. Pick a character in an opponent's discard pile. EFFECT: Remove that character from the game. This turn, this card gains COVERT. You may put the top 3 cards of that opponent's deck into their discard pile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: equal opportunity molester

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you control at least [O][O], your opponent discards 1 card. If you control at least [G][G], draw 1 card. If you control at least [E][E], put 1 Micromajig token into play under your control. If you control at least [D][D], search your opponent's deck for 1 card and put it into their discard pile. If you control at least [R][R], you may pick a character. If you do, inflict 2 damage to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i don't think that's a word

property.name: Subtype
property.value: giada, sword of great justice

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Giada
This card loses 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.
If this card would be destroyed by an opposing card or effect, you may put a token on it instead. If you do, deplete it and remove it from combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: last Sword to swear allegiance to Padamose Giada's independence was matched only by her grit.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: octo-ba-ba, sword of great justice

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Octo-Ba-Ba
If a character your opponent controls is destroyed, put a token on this card.
DEVOUR COST: Pay 3. Deplete this card. Remove a token from this card. Pick a character or location. EFFECT: Inflict 3 damage to the character or location.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by w4r10rd Some historians trace Direstock's cannibalistic culture to Octo-Ba-Ba's influence.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: grandchest, seraphim, dragon

property.name: Card Text
property.value:
UNIQUE Grandchest
If battle damage is inflicted to a character you control, reduce the amount by 2.
If battle damage is inflicted to a character your opponent controls, increase the amount by 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: gory gory hallelujah Venerated by the Marmothoans as a guardian, reviled by their enemies as a destroyer.

card.name: The Great Wall of Keeping Stuff Out

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If a player plays a tactic, terminate it and inflict 1 damage to this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by Sigorion Known by the tribal people as the Shrine of Greanpatoot.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If a character you control is destroyed, you may pay 1. If you do, search your deck for a card with the same name, reveal it, and put it on top of your deck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: original Open R&D concept by waiya A half ton of pure popularity.
